Rats

Rats are common enemies found throughout Remixed Dungeon, with several variants that players will encounter.

Rat Variants

  • Rat - Basic rat enemy
  • Albino Rat - Special variant with unique mechanics (bleeding effect)
  • Black Rat - Dark-furred rat variant (custom mob implemented via JSON configuration)
  • Giant Rat Skull - Quest item dropped by Fetid Rat
  • Fetid Rat - Poisonous rat variant that emits toxic gas clouds
  • Suspicious Rat - Unique rat variant that transforms into Pseudo Rat when threatened
  • Pseudo Rat - Dangerous creature that emerges from Suspicious Rat's transformation

Common Properties

  • HP: Generally low to moderate
  • Damage: Moderate for their level
  • Behavior: Usually non-aggressive until approached
  • Drop Rate: Varies by rat type, typically low-value items or food

Dungeon Locations

  • Sewers: Most common location for basic rats
  • Other levels: Various rat variants appear throughout the dungeon
  • Guts Level: Suspicious Rats, Zombie Gnolls, and Worms (levels 26-30)
  • Special areas: Certain rat variants appear in specific themed areas

Strategy

  • Rats are generally early-game enemies
  • Can pose a threat in groups
  • Some variants have special abilities (poison, disease, etc.)
  • Generally worth fighting for experience and drops
  • Suspicious Rats should be killed quickly before they can transform into Pseudo Rats

Code Reference

  • Rat - Basic rat implementation
  • Albino - Albino rat with bleeding effect
  • Black Rat - JSON-configured rat variant
  • Fetid Rat - Rat variant that emits gas clouds (Ghost.FetidRat inner class)
  • Suspicious Rat - Rat that transforms into Pseudo Rat
  • Pseudo Rat - Creature that emerges from Suspicious Rat transformation

Related Enemies

  • Gnolls - Often found near rat populations in the sewers
  • Crab - Other common sewer enemy

See Also

  • Enemies - List of all enemies
  • Sewers - Level where rats are common
  • Rat - Basic rat variant
  • Albino Rat - Special rat variant
